[i][b]Amidst the controversy of the war in Vietnam, a non-conformist DJ is drafted in by the army for an early morning radio show. He blasts the formerly staid and sanitized air-waves with a constant barrage of rapid-fire humour and the hippest tunes from back home. A first rate comic performance from Williams, set against the grim background of war.
[/b][/i]
